title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Boil spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat oil in a pan and sauté onion and garlic.
Add minced beef and cook until brown.
Pour in tomato sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Chicken Fried Rice
instructions: Cook chicken and cut into small pieces.
Scramble eggs in a pan and set aside.
Mix in chicken, eggs, and soy sauce.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Add milk and eggs and whisk until smooth.
Pour batter and cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook the other side.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Grill on medium heat until golden brown.
Flip and cook the other side.
